name: CareGuide Inc.
description: Operator of an online care provider marketplace intended to match families with care providers through a portfolio of websites. The company's marketplace offers senior care, child care, pet care and home care services, enabling customers to find local care providers, including nannies, babysitters, pet sitters, elder-care providers and house sitters.
one_liner: Operator of an online care provider marketplace intended to match families with care providers through a portfolio of websites. The company's marketplace offers senior care, child care, pet care and home care services, enabling customers to find local care providers, including nannies, babysitters, pet sitters, elder-care providers and house sitters.
